body_html: @fmassa - its not consistently outperforming our existing CPU kernel for some of the standard Vision models. For example, our existing kernel outperforms NNPACK on resnet-18, alexnet, and is a toss-up for densenet and some others. It could possibly be because @Maratyszcza has optimized for running inference, and thus does not have batch_size=1 optimized kernel for the gradients.

body: @fmassa - its not consistently outperforming our existing CPU kernel for some of the standard Vision models. For example, our existing kernel outperforms NNPACK on `resnet-18`, `alexnet`, and is a toss-up for `densenet` and some others. It could possibly be because @Maratyszcza has optimized for running inference, and thus does not have `batch_size=1` optimized kernel for the gradients.
